# LeafProperty.ExtendedFeatures.MD_CLEAR property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

MD_CLEAR. VERW instruction clears CPU buffers.

* Leaf: ExtendedFeatures
* Property: MD_CLEAR
* Unit: None

Type: Boolean
